contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} '''Bloodstone''' may refer to: *[[Bloodstone (band)]], an R&B, soul and funk band **''Bloodstone'', a 1972 album of [[Bloodstone (band)|Bloodstone]] *''[[James Bond 007: Blood Stone]]'', a 2010 James Bond video game *[[Ulysses Bloodstone]], fictional comic character **[[Elsa Bloodstone]], fictional comic book character, the daughter of Ulysses Bloodstone *[[Bloodstone (1988 film)|''Bloodstone'' (1988 film)]], a 1988 action/comedy film *[[Bloodstone (2009 film)|''Bloodstone'' (2009 film)]], a 2009 horror film *''[[Bloodstone: An Epic Dwarven Tale]]'', a 1993 video game by Mindcraft Software, Inc. *''[[Bloodstone: Subspecies II]]'', a 1993 horror film *"Bloodstone", a song by Judas Priest from the 1982 album ''[[Screaming for Vengeance]]'' *"Bloodstone", a song by Amon Tobin from the 2007 album ''[[Foley Room]]'' *"Bloodstone", a novel by Karl Edward Wagner, featuring Kane the Mystic Swordsman '''Bloodstone''' may also be: *[[Heliotrope (mineral)]], also known as bloodstone, a form of chalcedony * [[Operation Bloodstone]], a CIA recruitment program for former German officers and diplomats who could be used in the covert war against the Soviet Union. * A item in the game ''[[Defense of the Ancients]]'' and ''[[Dota 2]]'' ==See also== *[[Bloodstone (comics)]], list of further usages *Bloodstone Lands is also the name of a kingdom in the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]'' ''D&D'' setting *Recruitment of Nazis Operation {{disambig}}
